data.name: Options_Tracker_Backups_Text_Description
data.value: 每天你啟動時自動建立備份檔。包含套牌、遊戲與設定。如果有7個以上的備份檔（自動建立），最舊的會被刪除，確保你有一週的備份檔。

data.name: BattlegroundsHeroPicking_Header_Tier2Tooltip_Desc
data.value: Heroes with average placements better than or equal to 4.5

data.name: BattlegroundsHeroPicking_Header_Tier3Tooltip_Desc
data.value: Heroes with average placements worse than 4.5 and within one standard deviation of the best hero in this tier

data.name: BattlegroundsHeroPicking_Header_Tier4Tooltip_Desc
data.value: Heroes with average placements worse than one standard deviation from the best tier 3 hero

data.name: BattlegroundsHeroPicking_Hero_ArmorTierTooltip_Desc
data.value: Higher armor tier heroes are offered quests with easier completion requirements.

data.value: Sign in to HSReplay.net to access Hero Pick Rates, Average Placements, Armor Tiers, and more!

data.name: BattlegroundsPreLobby_AnonymousTooltip_Bottom
data.value: Subscribe to Tier7 to unlock unlimited usage.

data.name: BattlegroundsPreLobby_InteractivePanel_Anonymous_Hover_Details

data.name: BattlegroundsPreLobby_Join
data.value: Join Tier7 to get unlimited access.

data.name: BattlegroundsQuestPicking_Header_Tier4Tooltip_Desc
data.value: Rewards with average placements worse than one standard deviation from the best tier 3 reward

data.name: BattlegroundsQuestPickingHeader_PickRateTooltip_Desc
data.value: Percent of the time this reward is picked by first place players

data.name: BattlegroundsQuestPickingHeader_AvgPlacementTooltip_Desc
data.value: The final placement this reward achieves on average, adjusted for your hero and the available minion types
